full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Project Title
Supply and Delivery of Select Structural Douglas Fir Timber

## Reference Number
WS3865078913-Doc3961110662

## Tender Status
Expired

## Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Objective
Parks Canada requires the supply and delivery of Select Structural Douglas Fir timber to their Rideau Canal Gate Shop in Smith Falls, Ontario. The purpose of this tender is to procure the necessary materials for the fabrication of two canal timber lock gates that need replacement.

## Contract Period
The contract period will commence upon contract award and is expected to last 10 weeks.

## Goods and Services Description
The required goods and services involve the supply and delivery of:

* Select Structural Douglas Fir timber

## Site Delivery Location
The goods will be delivered to the Parks Canada Agency in Smith Falls, Ontario.

## Quantity and Specifications
The required quantity and specifications for the goods are as follows:

* Multiple deliveries are acceptable with all items delivered within 10 weeks from the date of contract award.

## Deadlines

* Tender closing date: 2023-05-23T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2023-05-31
* Expected contract end date: 2023-08-21

## Language of Documents
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity
This tender is restricted to Ontario (except NCR).

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PC).

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact:

Shen, Tao (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: tao.shen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
For more information and to access the tender package, please visit:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15963560?extsite=MTU5NjM1Nj
